mapper.insert: insert into USER_MASTER( USER_TYPE, PROVIDER_CD, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PWD, USER_NICK_NM, USER_NM, USER_GRADE, CRE_DT, CRE_ID, UPD_ID ) values ( #{userType}, #{providerCd}, #{loginId}, #{loginPwd}, #{userNickNm}, #{userNm}, #{userGrade}, NOW(), #{creId}, #{updId} );
mapper.select: select LOGIN_ID as loginId, LOGIN_PWD as loginPwd, USER_NICK_NM as userNickNm, USER_GRADE as userGrade, USER_TYPE as userType, USER_NO as userNo from USER_MASTER where LOGIN_ID = #{loginId};

select um.USER_NO as userNo, um.USER_TYPE as userType, (select cd.CODE_D_NM as USER_TYPE_NM from CMM_CODE_D cd where cd.CODE_M_SEQ = 2 and CODE_D_SEQ = um.USER_TYPE) as userTypeNm, um.PROVIDER_CD as providerCd, um.LOGIN_ID as loginId, um.LOGIN_PWD as loginPwd, um.USER_PROFILE as userProfile, um.USER_IMAGE_DIV as userImageDiv, um.USER_NICK_NM as userNickNm, um.USER_NM as userNm, um.USER_GRADE as userGrade, um.USER_BIRTH as userBirth, um.CRE_DT as creDt, um.CRE_ID as creId, um.UPD_DT as updDt, um.UPD_ID as UpdId from USER_MASTER um order by um.CRE_DT;
